sub_title: Senior Manager - Account Development Delivery Lead at Infosys (Certified SAFe 5 Agilist, Transformation Program Manager)
summary:
Strong Program Management, Delivery, and logistics domain expertise with ~20 years of hands-on experience of working across APAC, North America and Europe focusing on IT transformation and business modernization. Specialize in greenfield transformational programs, Cloud adoption, setting up large teams and establishing Agile practices. With an amalgamation of thought leadership, operational excellence, and cutting-edge technologies, I have helped deliver high business value for my customers across various realms of their business. 

-- Expertise in Program Management, Delivery Management, People Management and Leadership, Building high performance team, Digital Agile adoptions, IT Outsourcing, Offshoring roadmap, Managed Services, Global Delivery, New Business Development, Pre-Sales, Client Management, , Agile and waterfall methodologies for development

I’m proud to be known as a high achiever with a strong work ethic and believe in the power of building positive relationships with people to build a culture of success. I lead and inspire teams through Trust – Collaboration – Transparency with a foundation of personal integrity. Having worked in different countries, I believe in being cognizant and respectful of various cultural and team dynamics. 

Account Development Delivery Lead for a team of 200+ software professionals across UK, Netherlands and India providing application development & transformation services for one of the world’s largest logistics providers. I am accountable and responsible for the Delivery of Development Projects and Infosys single point of contact for the client. Additional responsibility of program managing modernization & transformation programs. At any given point of time responsible for 5+ transformation programs, 20+ projects & 30+ enhancements.

I have managed the transition of portfolio of applications across 4 different locations in UK. Handling senior level stakeholders from customer side and be on top of all the issues/escalations, planning for all the transition waves and ensuring that we meet the timelines for ~100 applications to be transitioned to Infosys in 6 months was a critical task. This success was later emulated in providing Application Management and development services for these transitioned application for next 2 years.

Skills: Digital Transformation · Account Management · Delivery Management · Program Management · Software Development · Agile Methodologies · Azure · Client Relationship Management · Pre-Sales

contributors.headline: Senior Manager - Account Development Delivery Lead at Infosys (Certified SAFe 5 Agilist, Transformation Program Manager)

profile_positions.description:
Account Development Delivery Lead for a team of 200+ software professionals across UK, Netherlands and India providing application development & transformation services for one of the world’s largest logistics providers. I am accountable and responsible for the Delivery of Development Projects and Infosys single point of contact for the client. Additionally playing role of Program Manager for modernization & transformation programs. At any given point of time responsible for 5+ transformation programs, 20+ projects & 30+ enhancements. Some of the key programs include:
 Program Manager transformation program for 30+ Applications running on End of Life (EOL) & End of Support (EOS) infrastructure and software – Application Hardening by upgrade of Infrastructure & software. Cloud Adoption (Azure) for 25 applications, 5 Applications transformation through cloud native architecture, microservice infrastructure design, DevSecOps, CI & CD to establish practices consistent with business strategy and priorities.
	Program Manager for Petya virus restoration exercise for 100+ customer impacted applications managed by Infosys. The program has visibility and daily reporting to FedEx CEO/CIO. Represented Infosys in the Daily Cadence for All hand meets involving customer Leadership (VPs and MDs) for ~ 2 months. Work closely with 200+ stakeholders including customer, multiple vendors and internal for successfully restoring all impacted customer applications.
	Program Managed cost saving transformation program (proactively proposed by Infosys) resulting in ~2 Million Cost Savings due to license release for IBM products. The program involved migrating 4 applications from IBM Cloud hosted integration technologies to on premise Integration infrastructure. Program was successfully executed in stringent timeframe of 5 months due to cut-off period of new financial year for realizing cost savings.
profile_positions.title: Account Development Delivery Lead & Transformation Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Operating Unit (OU) Manager accountable and responsible for the following:
•	Managing Support & Maintenance for all the 70+ applications under CIT, Billing & Finance Operating Unit. Team size include 12+ Onsite team members and 50+ Offshore team members working across Pune and TVM in India location
•	Primarily responsibilities included Service Operations management: Incident Management, Problem Management, Service Level Management, Service Requests Management, Continued Service Improvement, Defect Management & Knowledge Management
•	Schedule, monitor, review and control of project so as to meet the agreed upon SLAs 
       and successfully deliver the support services
•	Successfully Lead multiple service improvement plans (SIPs) covering various facets – ticket 
       elimination/reduction through left shift, optimization and automation
•	Successfully Lead multiple proposals to take up additional applications in support scope, design 
        the solution prepared & reviewed the estimates, liaison for required approvals and took the 
        bottom line for response delivery
•	People management, communication and leadership
•	Customer stakeholder reporting and Client relationship management 
•	Risk & mitigation management. RAID tracker was maintained and shared daily and weekly with the 
        respective stakeholders 
•	Issues, escalation management
•	Collaboration with SIAM and other service providers 
•	Internal stakeholder management and coordination across Infosys units

Technologies: Variety of technologies like Java, Microsoft, .NET, Mainframe, SAP, Integration, 
                       Infrastructure Middleware, BI, Mobility, etc.
Environments: Variety of platforms like Windows, Unix , Linux, Mainframe, etc.
profile_positions.title: Operating Unit Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a Transition Manager,sSuccessfully Managed Application Support Transition of ~100+ applications from client to Infosys. Was accountable and responsible for the following:
•	Pre-KT application information gathering and KT planning.
•	Execution of the Knowable Transfer phases
•	Execution of the Secondary and Primary shadow support phases
•	People management, communication and leadership
•	Customer stakeholder reporting and Client relationship management 
•	Risk & mitigation management. 
•	Issues, escalation management
•	Internal stakeholder management and coordination across Infosys units
•	Also doubled up as Wave 3 Manager for all the 300+ applications. Responsibilities include progress tracking, consolidated status reporting, client management for all the wave 3 apps
profile_positions.title: Transition Manager

profile_positions.description:
SWAT Program Manager - accountable and responsible for the following:
•	Program Managed SWAT team of 33+ members (14 Onsite Architects and 19 Offshore members) and delivered program objectives in short duration of 3 months.
•	Responsible for tracking, control and reporting to internal/external stakeholders
•	Provided Technical direction and Leadership to the team.
•	Preparation of final presentation deliverable to customer for critical apps covering - Application Dashboard, Technical Health Report,	Findings & Recommendations, 	High-level solution recommendations and associated high-level cost and timeline estimation
•	Reviews for Findings & Recommendations, Solutions and Estimates 
•	Risk & mitigation management
•	Customer stakeholder interaction and reporting
•	Internal stakeholder management and coordination across Infosys large team.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a Technical Project Manager accountable and responsible for the following:
•	Successfully managed a team of 10+ members and delivered project using Agile paradigm with 4-week delivery cycle and scope of project included– Development of new system
•	Lead Planning and Scoping and define the project requirements both functional & non functional
•	Lead the design, estimation activities, review the estimates and communicate to all the stakeholders and align customer for budgeting and internal resource planning
•	Detailed project schedule and manage any changes in order to ensure on time delivery of the project
•	Project tracking, control and reporting to internal/external stakeholders
•	People Management
profile_positions.title: Technical Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
As Project Manager was accountable and responsible for the following:
•	Managed a team of 12+ members involved in design and development work using Agile paradigm with 4-week delivery cycle and multiple stream of work primarily in Mail and E-Commerce domain with J2EE architecture.
•	Lead Planning and Scoping and define the project requirements both functional & non functional
•	Lead the estimation activities, review the estimates and communicate to all the stakeholders and align customer for budgeting and internal resource planning.
•	Responsible for detailed project schedule and manage any changes in order to ensure on time delivery of the project.
•	Responsible for project tracking, control and reporting to internal/external stakeholders.
•	Responsible for People Management
•	Issues, escalation, dependency management 
•	Risk & mitigation management
•	Won KM RnR Award (2012) in Medium Category at Infosys Level for Knowledge Management best practices incorporated in the project.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
This role involved leading 8-member team.
•	Responsible for planning, estimation, requirement gathering and analysis, design and reviews. 
•	Design and Development of Java Web-services and interfaces.
•	Responsible for Offshore Co-ordination- breaking the work package for development by Offshore team, tracking the progress, requirements clarification and deliverable reviews.
•	Client Management
Technologies: Java, Spring, Tibco CIM 8.1, Tibco GI, Java, Web Services, XSD, Oracle, SVN, Oracle 10g.
Environments: IBM PC compatibles, HP–UX, Windows 2008 server.
profile_positions.title: Technical Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Technical Team Lead was responsible for in the following:
•	This role involved leading a 6-member team.
•	Involved in the planning, estimation, design, development and reviews at the Client location, using Agile paradigm incorporating cutting edge technology and frameworks. 
•	Design and development of AEAS system – machine communication protocol for data exchange between application and encoding & sorting machines. The protocol design was based on the hessian protocol and resulted in achieving sub 50 millisecond response from application to machine and was key requirement from the solution.
•	Developed the UI framework for the application based on Java swing with focus reusability and framework approach to writing the UI interfaces, validations and configurations.
•	Application of Design Patterns for system design.
•	Development of multiple GUIs, APIs and interfaces.
•	Responsible for Offshore Co-ordination- breaking the work package for development by Offshore team, tracking the progress, requirements clarification and deliverable reviews.
•	Client Management
•	 L3 Support for Production Environment.
•	Extensive use of Test Driven development, automated regression testing 
•	Continuous Integration achieved from the 1st iteration.
•	Won Most Valuable Player (MVP) as Programmer Analyst (2008) and Infosys APAC Excellence 
     Award (2007)

Technologies: Java, Swing, Spring, JGoodies, SwingX, Abbot, JUnit, Jenkins, Maven, SVN, Oracle 10g.

Environments: IBM PC compatibles, HP–UX, Windows 2003 server.
profile_positions.title: Technical Team Lead

profile_positions.location: Paris Area, France & Prague, Czech Republic

profile_positions.description:
As a Software Engineer my responsibilities/achievements were as follows –
•      Full stack developer involved in development of User Interfaces, Java APIs, Writing & Optimizing 
       SQL  queries, PL/SQL
•     Development of Effective Date factory which was the heart of the application and used by all the 
       APIs  and modules for determining any master data entity effective on given day/period.
•	Unit Testing – Manual & Automated using Junits.
•	Peer Code Review
•	Documentation – Unit Test Plan, System Test Plan & User Guides 
•	Knowledge Management – Created Knowledge Articles, Published artefacts in Kshop (Infosys  
        Knowledge Management Portal) 
•	Client Interaction. Travelled 1 month to Onsite Malaysia for supporting Alpha Release of GREF 2.0.
•	Won Infosys APAC Excellence Award in 2004 for my contributions to API Code generator and 
        Effective Data Factory component

Technologies: Java, JSP, HTML, Struts, WebLogic, Junits, EJB, XML, UNIX, Informix Database, Source Safe, PL/SQL, C++.
Environments: IBM PC compatibles and HP–UX.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
